gameDetails.name: Ashes Reborn: The Messenger of Peace
gameDetails.description:
Phoenixborn Orrick Gilstream uses time and charm magic to keep peace a top priority amidst an ever-raging war.

Orrick is a skilled practitioner of meditation, and his insight offers him the ability to not only improve his magic proficiency through meditation, but also expand access to options other Phoenixborn cannot.  Orrick slips into an "Awakened State" where he is able to give direct damage to both enemy units and Phoenixborn, bringing his conflicts to a dramatic conclusion!
